New Records: Kusal Mendis scored 60 runs for Sri Lanka
Bangladesh were eliminated from the tournament
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka chased down 184 runs in 19.2 overs
Several key wickets fell during the match
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka and Bangladesh needed to win to qualify for the Super Four stage
Dasun Shanaka won the toss and opted to bowl first
Both teams made changes to their playing XIs
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka qualified for the Super Four stage
Bangladesh were eliminated after losing both group matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a do-or-die clash
The target of 184 runs was achieved by Sri Lanka
The match had several twists and turns
